transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan. Good morning.
Executive: Good morning.
Executive: Ji, Teshna baat kar rahi hu IndiaMART se, Shiva Enterprises, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Awaaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Haan, boliye na.
Executive: Sir, aapki voice break ho rahi hai, aap thoda sa network area mein move ho jaaiye please.
Customer: Haan, boliye.
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji, sir.
Executive: Sir, aapne hi call kiya tha, right? Saturday mein, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, toh kya issue hai? Business nahi mil raha hai aapko, right?
Customer: Nahi, business nahi mil raha, business bhi nahi ho raha hai. Hum chahte hai mere ko isko band karke mera rupiya ko wapas dijiye, yahi hai.
Executive: Abhi aap bahar hai kya?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, okay, kab aap available rahenge? Kyunki abhi aapki awaaz nahi aa rahi hai clear.
Customer: Uh, ek ghanta baad.
Executive: Kaise?
Customer: Tab ek ghanta baad humko milega.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Ek ghante ke baad mein call karti hu aapko.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to close subscription and refund.

- Customer is not getting business.



Resolution:

- Executive will call after one hour.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, business
